ingredients.ingredient: 1 (11 ounce) package Sister Schubert's Parker House Style Yeast Rolls
2 cups favorite prepared barbecue pulled pork, beef or chicken, warmed

cookingTips: Warm rolls according to package directions before assembling
Keep pulled pork warm in a slow cooker during serving
Toast rolls lightly for better structural integrity
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user assemble quick and impressive mini sliders using quality prepared ingredients for a party or gathering.
